SELECT ITEM_KIND_ID, ITEM_KIND_NAME,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_ITEM_KIND
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False
INSERT INTO MS_ITEM_KIND( ITEM_KIND_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :ITEM_KIND_NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_ITEM_KIND SET ITEM_KIND_NAME = :ITEM_KIND_NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE ITEM_KIND_ID = :ITEM_KIND_ID
